item.description:
I am taking my Hiking/Biking  Meet-Up here on Sunday.  Feel free to join us.  Not sure about the Weather.  I have about 9 going, so far.

East Bay Bike Path, seems to be everyones favorite.  Very scenic and very flat.  I can not believe  we have only rode this path  twice, this year.   If you have never been on it, why not give it a try.   

The distance to Bristol is about 13 miles.  I like to go thru Colt State Park, to add a few extra miles.  There are Restrooms, at Colt State Park.  We probably will split into a few groups.  Feel free to go at your own pace and whatever distance you feel comfortable with. You can always turn around if you start getting tired.  I am sorry, but unless the turnout is small, I will not be able to watch everyone.   If you were wondering, I plan to ride non stop to Colt State Park.  There take in the Views and some snacks, then head back.  Depending on how I feel, I may ride to Providence. 

 

    Directions:  Route 95 to Route 195 East, take Exit #4 /   the exit forks, stay Right Riverside /  follow Veterans Memorial Parkway  and you will see a Large Parking Lot on the Right.  I am not sure if the street # is 100.
item.how_to_find_us: We will be in the First Large Parking Lot on the Right
item.name: Bike the East Bay Bike Path
